Investor_9.name: Elena Ivanova
Investor_9.content: Following the recent failed investment due to a lack of an allocation plan from the trustee and the possible existence of blacklists between us, I maintain a cautious approach in the investment community. I prioritize being discerning and strategic in my choices to ensure that future partnerships are built on trust and transparency. My recent experience reinforces my commitment to evaluating the integrity of my future investments to protect my resources and reputation.

Trustee_8.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8.content: The lack of a viable allocation plan and the possibility of blacklisting significantly tarnish my reputation as a trustee. This situation indicates a failure to maintain the necessary trustworthiness and competence expected in investment relationships. The absence of connections within the community reflects a severe deficiency in pro-social behaviors, essential for building a positive reputation.
